DistributorAuthorization.name: DistributorAuthorization
DistributorAuthorization.description: Represents the official authorization from an insurance company granting a distributor the permission to act as its agent.

AccountId.description: The ID of the distributor’s business account.

AuthorizedInsuranceLineId.description: The insurance line that the insurance company is authorized to sell.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact associated with the producer.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which this authorization is in effect.

ExpirationDate.description: The date on which this authorization expires.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the authorization is active (true) or inactive (false). The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LicenseId.description: The distributor’s business license against which the distributor is authorized.

Name.description: An auto-number identifier for this distributor authorization.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Status.description: The authorization status of the distributor.

TerminationCause.description: The reason for the termination of the distributor’s authorization.
